content.rendered:
During November 7-10 it will take place the Spanish National Conference of Statistics and O.R. in Elche (Spain). This conference takes place every year and a half and it gathers the main spanish researcher in statistics, probability and O.R.

Enrique Miranda is attending the conference in company of the young student David Nieto-Barba. They will present two works:

  1. Distorsión de conjuntos de probabilidades, by Nieto-Barba, Montes and Miranda.
  2. Uso de aproximaciones 2-monótonas interiores y exteriores en problemas de decisión, by Montes, Miranda and Presa.

The former will be presented by David Nieto-Barba and the latter by Miranda.
